none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 16, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 "Steady Hands" kicks in and I feel like I just discovered some unknown Chiswick nugget. But it's not London '78...it's Tucson '22. And it's not a rehash...CLASS are students. CLASS are students...and "Pills On A Dish" gets straight fukkn As.CLASS
